--- format: html: code-fold: show code-summary: "Ocultar código" code-line-numbers: false code-annotations: false code-link: true code-tools: source: true toggle: true caption: "Código" code-overflow: scroll page-layout: full editor_options: chunk_output_type: console categories: ["geom_spatvector"] execute: eval: false echo: true warning: false title: "Semana 07" date: 2025-02-18 author: Víctor Gauto --- Agencias de seguridad en Universidades de EE.UU. ![Semana 07, 2025](semana_07.png) ## Paquetes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(glue) library(ggtext) library(showtext) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Estilos Colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#005D67" c2 <- "#1B817F" c3 <- "#9FCEBA" c4 <- "#F9FFAF" c5 <- "white" ``` ::: Fuente: Ubuntu. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} font_add( family = "ubuntu", regular = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Regular.ttf", bold = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Bold.ttf", italic = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Italic.ttf" ) showtext_auto() showtext_opts(dpi = 300) ``` ::: ## Epígrafe ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fuente <- glue( "Datos: ", "{{tidytuesdayR}} semana 07, ", "FBI Crime Data API." ) autor <- glue("**Víctor Gauto**") icon_twitter <- glue("") icon_instagram <- glue("") icon_github <- glue("") icon_mastodon <- glue("󰫑") icon_bsky <- glue("") usuario <- glue("**vhgauto**") sep <- glue("**|**") mi_caption <- glue( "{fuente}
{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 07) agencies <- tuesdata$agencies ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesan las agencias de seguridad asociadas a universidades. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} v <- agencies |> filter(agency_type == "University or College" & state != "Alaska") |> drop_na(latitude, longitude) |> terra::vect(geom = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = "EPSG:4326") |> terra::project("ESRI:102003") ``` ::: ## Figura Logo y subtítulo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} link_logo <- "https://cde.ucr.cjis.gov/LATEST/webapp/assets/images/CDE-new-15shad.png" logo <- glue("") mi_subtitulo <- glue( "En EE.UU. existen {nrow(v)} organismos de fuerzas de seguridad con jurisdicción en Universidades" ) ``` ::: Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- usmap::plot_usmap( regions = "states", exclude = c("AK", "HI"), fill = c2, linewidth = 1, color = c1 ) + tidyterra::geom_spatvector( data = v, size = 1, alpha = .8, color = c4 ) + annotate( geom = "richtext", x = I(.2), y = I(.06), label = logo, fill = NA, label.color = NA ) + labs( subtitle = mi_subtitulo, caption = mi_caption ) + theme( plot.background = element_rect(fill = c1, color = NA), plot.subtitle = element_markdown( family = "ubuntu", size = 17, color = c5, hjust = .5, margin = margin(t = 15) ), plot.caption = element_markdown( family = "ubuntu", size = 10, color = c3, lineheight = 1.1, margin = margin(b = 10, r = 10) ) ) ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_07.png", width = 30, height = 21, units = "cm" ) ``` :::
